title: Corner Cupboard
description: Corner Cupboard; Pierre Garnier (French, about 1720 - 1800, master 1742); Paris, France; about 1760 - 1765; Fir and oak veneered with ebony, tulipwood, amaranth and willow; gilt bronze mounts; marble top; 135.3 x 61 x 41.9 cm (53 1/4 x 24 x 16 1/2 in.); 81.DA.82.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
